name: Bessie's Day Out
description:
Games Members
Bessie's Day Out
 - Extra Credits Game Jam 2018
 - Bessie, the adorable station wagon, is out for an adventure. With her trusty rocket booster.

- Most sounds were recorded on an actual station wagon named Bessie. Thanks to all the family and friends who helped out in our recordings :D


- We love hearing feedback! Contact us at https://www.facebook.com/NDcisiveGames/
Designed and created by: Steven Coffey & Zach Smith
